services.title: Managed Campaigns
services.desc: Complete hands-off SEO management. We handle strategy, execution, and reporting while you maintain the client relationship.

services.title: Link Building
services.desc: High-DR backlinks from real corporate blogs and news sites. No PBNs.

services.title: Content Engine
services.desc: SEO-optimized articles written by subject matter experts, not just AI.

services.title: Local Presence
services.desc: GMB optimization, local citations, and review management to capture local intent.

services.title: Technical Audits
services.desc: Deep dive crawling to identify indexation bloat, canonical issues, and core web vitals failures.

services.title: White-label Dashboards
services.desc: Give your clients a live view of their growth with your own branded portal.

testimonials.name: Sarah Jenkins
testimonials.message: Stan Ventures completely transformed our fulfillment process. We've scaled from 10 to 50 clients without hiring a single in-house SEO specialist.

testimonials.name: David Chen
testimonials.message: The transparency and reporting are unmatched. My clients are happy, retention is up, and I can focus on sales while they handle the heavy lifting.

process.title: Discovery
process.desc: We analyze your client's website, competitors, and goals to build a custom roadmap.

process.title: Execution
process.desc: Our team handles everything—content, links, technical fixes—while you take the credit.

process.title: Scale
process.desc: Receive white-label reports showing growth, then identify new opportunities to scale.
